name: Lambda Financial Technologies Inc.
description: Provider of automated credit card services intended to improve financial life. The company offers a consumer credit card with automation that gives people control over their finances while saving time by allowing users to set customized rules on where, when, and how they can use the card, enabling cardholders to automate their finances and customize the credit card experience through their mobile phones.
one_liner: Provider of automated credit card services intended to improve financial life. The company offers a consumer credit card with automation that gives people control over their finances while saving time by allowing users to set customized rules on where, when, and how they can use the card, enabling cardholders to automate their finances and customize the credit card experience through their mobile phones.
